content:
{"textdoc_id": "67b33c70b98c81918f6526d15f615900", "updates": [{"pattern": ".*", "multiple": true, "replacement": "🔥 **Vertex AI Model Deployment - Full Configuration Review**

📌 **Objective:** Ensure the full model setup is structured correctly to prevent further delays. This is the complete list of settings based on our prior discussions.

✅ **1️⃣ General Model Settings**
- **Name:** AI-Execution-System
- **Region:** `us-central1`
- **Persistent Resource:** Ensure it is selected (if unavailable, reattempt after refresh)
- **Machine Type:** `n1-standard-4` (adjust as needed for scaling)
- **Scaling:** Auto-scaling enabled
- **Logging & Monitoring:** Stackdriver Enabled
- **Security & IAM:** Ensure Vertex AI has Firestore read/write permissions

✅ **2️⃣ Hyperparameter Tuning**
| **Parameter Name**        | **Type**   | **Min - Max**  | **Scaling**  | **Metric to Optimize** | **Goal**   | **Max Trials** | **Parallel Trials** | **Algorithm**  |
|--------------------------|------------|----------------|--------------|---------------------|------------|----------------|-----------------|-------------|
| Learning Rate           | Float      | 0.0001 - 0.1   | Log          | Validation Accuracy | Maximize   | 20             | 4               | Bayesian    |
| Batch Size              | Integer    | 16 - 128       | Linear       | Training Speed      | Maximize   | 15             | 3               | Random      |
| Number of Layers        | Integer    | 1 - 5          | Linear       | Model Efficiency    | Maximize   | 10             | 2               | Bayesian    |
| Dropout Rate            | Float      | 0.1 - 0.5      | Linear       | Generalization      | Minimize   | 10             | 2               | Grid Search |
| Weight Decay            | Float      | 0.00001 - 0.01 | Log          | Overfitting Control | Minimize   | 10             | 2               | Bayesian    |
| Hidden Units            | Integer    | 32 - 512       | Linear       | Model Complexity    | Maximize   | 15             | 3               | Random      |
| Activation Function     | Categorical | relu, sigmoid, tanh | N/A      | Network Efficiency  | Maximize   | 10             | 2               | Grid Search |
| Optimizer Type         | Categorical | adam, sgd, rmsprop | N/A      | Model Performance   | Maximize   | 10             | 2               | Bayesian    |

✅ **3️⃣ Prediction Container Settings**
- **Container Image:** `gcr.io/YOUR_PROJECT_ID/custom-ai-execution:latest`
- **Model Output Directory:** `gs://YOUR_BUCKET_NAME/ai_execution_outputs/`
- **Execution Arguments:** `--execution_mode=real_time --logging_enabled=True --optimization_level=high`
- **Machine Type:** `n1-standard-4`
- **Scaling:** Auto-scaling enabled

📌 **Final Steps:**
🚀 **Ensure all these settings are input correctly.**
🚀 **If anything still does not work, confirm errors and report back.**
🚀 **Once confirmed, proceed with full deployment and execution testing.** 🔥"}]}
